actions.message:
```
!Help                   Lists available commands
!SendEmbed              Sends an embed message
!UserInfo               Displays the user's information
!ChannelInfo            Displays the channel's information
!RoleInfo [role-name]   Displays info for the role
!Slap [@user]           Slaps the mentioned user
!FlipCoin               Returns "Heads" or "Tails"
!GenNumber [min] [max]  Returns a random number
!Gold                   Display's the user's gold
!Gamble                 The user randomly gains or loses some gold
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
This is an embed message.

One may add a description and/or multiple fields.

Use "Send Embed Description" and "Add Embed Field" before sending the embed message in order to customize it!
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
To send emojis, all you must do is: `:emoji-name:`

:smile: :thumbsup:

actions.message:
- Deathbattle Settings Help -
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings help` - Displays this help message with command information and usage
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings add` - Starts a prompt where you can add your own events/actions onto the current deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings list` - Displays a lsit of deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings remove {event/action}` - Removes a certain action from the deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings restore` - Restores the default deathbattle events/actions
`${tempVars("botPrefix")}deathbsettings info [action/event]` - Shows info for provided action/event
actions.name: Send Message
Run Script

Run Script

actions.message:
Wheat Crops - 1 resource p/ msg - 5,000 cash
Corn Crops - 2 resources p/ msg - 10,000 cash
Potato Crops - 5 resources p/ msg - 20,000 cash
Sugarcane Crops - 10 resources p/ msg - 50,000 cash
Carrot Crops - 20 resources p/ msg - 100,000 cash
actions.name: Add Embed Field

actions.message:
5x Wheat = Bread
10x Corn = Bag of popcorn
20x Potato = Bag of potato's
50x Sugarcane = 1Kg sugar
100x Carrot = Carrot soup
5x Wheat + 2x Pig meat = Sandwhich
10x Corn + 10x Sugarcane = Sweet popcorn
20x Potato + 20x Carrot = Vegetable soup
actions.name: Add Embed Field

Mention a user to kick them.
Usage: ro.kick [@user] [reason]
Example: ro.kick ${member} Not using the kick command properly.

Only mention one user.
Usage: ro.kick [@user] [reason]
Example: ro.kick ${member} Mentioning more than one user on the kick command.

```toml
Example:
${server.tag}warn @SomeDude#12345 3
```
